attributes.action: Bring Back National Service & Form A British "Foreign Legion"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that a Compulsory National Service is introduced where ALL young persons are required by law to serve in the Armed Forces for a minimum of 3 years. We also request the formation of a "Foreign Legion" of would-be immigrants where they would ALL be required to serve for a minimum of 3 years before they have ANY rights of citizenship in the UK. Any immigrant refusing to serve will be deported immediately without the right of appeal.
